projects.name: ART (Account Receivable Transformation)
projects.description: A 2023 finance initiative to rebuild the invoice-to-cash process, aligning billing outputs with Accounts Receivable. The goal was to ensure invoices, payments, and reconciliations matched so Finance could close faster with fewer errors. I led the project with CES Vietnam and Capco under a waterfall model, redesigning receivable logic, payment application, and reconciliation steps to reduce mismatches and improve reporting accuracy.

projects.name: COO (Change of Ownership logic)
projects.description: The rules and processes that handle account move-in and move-out events to ensure the right customer is billed for the right days and usage. The purpose is to prevent duplicate charges, missed bills, or misapplied balances when ownership changes. In 2025, I led the redesign of COO logic, refactoring effective-date handling, proration, and 814 event processing to improve billing reliability and reduce account transfer errors.

projects.name: EDI Mapping (814, 820, 867)
projects.description: The integration layer that translates inbound and outbound utility EDI transactions and moves them securely across systems. Its purpose is to keep billing, usage, and payment data accurate between CES and utilities. My work involved maintaining EDI maps, handling decryption and encryption (PGP/SFTP), and validating schema and business rules with SQL, ensuring clean and reliable integrations across staging and production.

projects.name: BLUE (Billing Load Usage & EDI system)
projects.description: CESâ€™s internal billing and usage platform that processes 814, 820, and 867 EDI transactions along with load usage data. The purpose of BLUE is to act as the single source of truth for usage and billing, ensuring that incoming utility data is validated and translated correctly before it drives invoicing. As a Software Engineer, I maintained and enhanced BLUE by supporting daily data loads, debugging integration issues, and using SQL/SSIS to ensure accuracy and stability across billing workflows.
